translations: 以……自豪（pride 的过去式和过去分词）

phrs.translation: 头等重要的位置；首要地位；傲慢
[古语]排场;虚荣[亦作 pride of the world]
处于…的顶峰(或最佳状态)
清晨的薄雾和阵雨(天晴的预兆)

sentences.sentence: She had always prided herself on her appearance.
sentences.translation: 她总是对自己的外貌感到得意。

sentences.sentence: If there was one thing she prided herself on, it was being open and aboveboard.
sentences.translation: 如果她对自己有一事而自豪，那就是她的公开及光明正大。

sentences.sentence: Until recently, the University of Kent prided itself on its friendly image.
sentences.translation: 直到最近，肯特大学还以其友好的形象而自豪。
